name: Tricky Bridge
description:
Learn and play the only game left in the world where the best computers cannot beat the best humans: BRIDGE! The greatest card game and the ultimate mind sport.

* FOR EXPERIENCED PLAYERS: Play anytime, 24/7: Practice solo, or enjoy the best "robot" duplicate bridge tournaments online and face off against players around the world.
* FOR BEGINNERS: Learn BRIDGE through fun, hand-crafted lessons, and earn rewards along the way. 100% free to learn.

Learn and master the card play, bidding, and tactical skills necessary to hold your own against a series of bridge masters!

FEATURES
* LEARN bridge basics solo for free through 37 lessons, challenges, and competitions.
* COMPETE in robot bridge tournaments, including Knockouts, Quick Tournaments, and Daily Tournaments. Climb the skill ranks from Rookie to Grand Master.
* IMPROVE your game by playing with World Champion AI, online or offline
* PRACTICE bridge solo, any time
* CUSTOMIZE your bidding system
* COLLECT over 80 beautiful card backs, tabletops, and card face themes to customize your experience.
* COMPLETE achievements and missions for rewards.
* ENJOY great card feel -- never play the wrong card by accident
